import React,{useState} from 'react' const data = { pseudo:'', email:'', password:'', confirmPassword:'' } function Inscription() { const [loginData, setLoginData] = useState(data) const {pseudo, email, password, confirmPassword} = loginData const dataState = pseudo !=='' && email !=='' && password !=='' && password === confirmPassword ? () : () const valider=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() } const valueInput=(e)=>{ setLoginData({...loginData,[e.target.id]: e.target.value}) } return (

Inscription

{dataState}
) } export default Inscription
